TopicTitle: I want my mun pyramid back >:[

Articles.Content:
I just noticed that the new terrai ngeneration turned the muns northpole from this awsome pyramid shape...

...to this "thing":

It looked MUCH nicer before!!!

 

 

 

Terrain settings are on max in both situations. The first pic is from jan '16 the second one from a few days ago.

Can't you just put a pyramid over the pole again? I really did enjoy climbing it. Now my kerbals just fall through the ground and die, thats not as nice as enjoying the view from top of a pyramid we all can agree on that I guess.

Hey, I saw your post on the Steam forums about this! That's a bummer. Pyramid looked cool. I'd like to see this fixed as well, obviously a bug/glitch.

<----(Chibbity btw.)
